title: Under the Surface
description:
Thomas Attila Lewis, R. Ben Garant, and Julissa Arce share stories about a Peeping Tom, the punk rock uniform, and un padre amoroso.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Thomas Blondet, Thomas Attila Lewis, Julissa Arce, Kevin Allison, Birdy, Sex Pistols, Jeff Barr, R. Ben Garant)
